description: I'm a Computer Science Student at Oklahoma State University living in Stillwater, Oklahoma. I am currently working as a Full Stack developer for the Plants & Soil Sciences at Oklahoma State University.
During my college career I've participated and won 1st place 3 times in my university's App Contest.

I'm also the founder and organizer of the Google Developers Group OSU Stillwater (GDG OSU) chapter. GDG activies involve planning and running events to expose students to a variety of topics. During the previous 3 years I've taught and coached many students on how to build their 1st Android application and developed a variety of tutorials that can be found on my github page.
When I'm not in class or working I really enjoy developing mobile apps, playing with my pets, hanging out with my wife and cooking.
